description:
When attempting to resize an instance via the OpenStack API, the compute API receives a 'flavorid' instead of an instance_type id for the "resize" call. These values don't always line up correctly so resizes might not act as expected.

When the OSAPI receives a resize call:

1) Retrieve the instance_type ID using the given flavorid
2) Call compute API with retrieved instance_type ID.
title: flavorid vs instance_type id mismatch
